## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (21efc33cab3b99c95cd6c0c7033eb6ee0b9aa4af189cbbfe2beb12c95da56e0b)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'react-native-windows-repo' @ 1.0.5 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
